title: This twitter account incites mob harrassment and still is running without consequences
selftext:
[https://twitter.com/randomsena](https://twitter.com/randomsena)

This twitter account (also with a whatsapp group chat) does mass reporting and mass email-bombing (also known as harrassment) against any minor dissent expressed against RSS or BJP. Some are against people for making fun of gods (which ofc is wrong. But no need to incite harrassment on them na?) But good god why do you need to attack people for speaking against your favourite political party? And they get butthurt for even minor jokes

An example of how they harrass: [https://twitter.com/randomsena/status/1693865418702884992](https://twitter.com/randomsena/status/1693865418702884992)

[https://twitter.com/randomsena/status/1699828303551689136](https://twitter.com/randomsena/status/1699828303551689136)

Just doing a rabid mob attack on anyone is just not ok. Idk how they've been running for this long.
comments: That's regular Twitter policy to suck up to the govt in power. Because power and money rules.
Chutye wo sirf religion pe bolne walo ko harassment karte hai
Lol. He thinks he can police the internet. He is only going after publicly identifiable a/cs. Someone send him to 4chan.
In the ocean of the internet, chaddi randomsena feels so proud after policing over a drop.
So, basically another one of  your fellow Incel losers with too much free time on their hands and nobody willing to respond to their desperate pleas for sexting.
Many foreigners even some indians talks shit about our country. How many times he have gone behind them?

They harrassed a woman for making a reel saying that she's sunkissed and "naughty sun" because soorya dev ki bezatti hui. Bhonduram bolne me Ram ke bezatti hui bhale hi khud Mastram roj rat ko dekhta ho. Agar nam me Ram laga hai to respect dena jaruri hai? Kya ye fir Nathuram ki tareef karega? Jhandu keyboard warrior sala
